name: Gourmet Roguelike
description:
Gourmet Roguelite

[WASD] or [LEFT ANALOG] to move

[MOUSE] or [RIGHT ANALOG] to aim

[LEFT CLICK] or [RIGHT TRIGGER] to shoot or confirm

[SPACE] or [LEFT TRIGGER] to roll

[TAB] to open inventory while in tavern

[LEFT CLICK] while close to cauldron to open crafting menu

Explore the dungeon with your food golems to scavenge new ingredients and make more powerful golems!

Click ingredients or drag them to the crafting area and click COOK! to

attempt to cook a food golem. Currently there are 6 golems in the game.

-Baguette - 3 Wheat

-Croissant - 2 Wheat, 1 Sugar

-?????? - 2 Sugar, 1 Wheat, 1 Strawberry

-?????? - 5 Sugar

-?????? - 5 Wheat

-?????? - 1 Wheat, 2 Sugar, 2 Banana
